name: Jed Rawson
bio_short: Jed Rawson is the founder and owner of Pirawna, a top 10 Amazon consulting agency in the U.S. managing over $2B in annual Amazon revenue. He specializes in turning chaotic, underperforming Amazon accounts into stable, profitable, scalable businesses.
bio_long: Jed Rawson is an Amazon strategist and founder of Pirawna, an Amazon consulting agency based in Frisco, Texas. Over the past decade he has helped brands across beauty, wellness, supplements, CPG, home goods, apparel, and outdoor products grow from small, unstable accounts into multiâ€“seven-figure monthly operations. Jed is known for rebuilding broken PPC structures, fixing suppressed listings, restoring account health, and building data-driven systems that allow brands to scale sustainably on Amazon.
